thread.title: 'Moonlight' Star Mahershala Ali Welcomes First Child -- See the Cute Pic!
thread.title_full: 'Moonlight' Star Mahershala Ali Welcomes First Child -- See the Cute Pic!

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: 'Moonlight' Star Mahershala Ali Welcomes First Child -- See the Cute Pic!
text: 'Moonlight' Star Mahershala Ali Welcomes First Child -- See the Cute Pic! by Jennifer Drysdale 2:22   Photo: Getty Images Win or lose on Sunday night, something tells us Mahershala Ali will go home a happy man! The Oscar-nominated actor took to Instagram on Friday to announce that he and his wife, Amatus Sami-Karim, had welcomed their first child together. A post shared by Mahershala Ali (@mahershalaali) on Feb 24, 2017 at 12:22pm PST EXCLUSIVE: 'Moonlight' Star Mahershala Ali Is Ready to Carry the Story ET caught up with the 42-year-old actor earlier this month, where he opened up about juggling the awards season with impending fatherhood. "You couldn't write it this way!" he joked. "I'd watch that movie and be like, 'OK, who make that up?'" And while Ali might be flying solo at the Oscars on Sunday, where he's nominated for Best Supporting Actor for his role in Moonlight , the actor told ET that his wife has been by his side from the beginning. A post shared by Mahershala Ali (@mahershalaali) on Dec 1, 2016 at 9:24pm PST "A big help is I have a supportive partner who loves me and gets it and has been a soldier throughout this," he gushed. See more in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
